SQL.SQLRaw: SELECT a.CodArticulo,a.Descripcion ,a.Cod1,a.Cod2,a.Cod3,a.Cod4 ,(SELECT Descripcion FROM EN01ARTI WHERE CodArticulo=a.cod1) AS Desc1 ,(SELECT Descripcion FROM EN01ARTI WHERE CodArticulo=a.cod2) AS Desc2 ,(SELECT Descripcion FROM EN01ARTI WHERE CodArticulo=a.cod3) AS Desc3 ,(SELECT Descripcion FROM EN01ARTI WHERE CodArticulo=a.cod4) AS Desc4 ,a.AnteriorUnidad,a.AnteriorKG,a.AnteriorMTSLIN,a.AnteriorMTS2 ,a.EntradaUnidad,a.EntradaKG,a.EntradaMTSLIN,a.EntradaMTS2 ,a.SalidasUnidad,a.SalidasKG,a.SalidasMTSLIN,a.SalidasMTS2 ,a.DevolucionesUnidad,a.DevolucionesKG,a.DevolucionesMTSLIN,a.DevolucionesMTS2 ,a.AnteriorUnidad+a.EntradaUnidad-SalidasUnidad+DevolucionesUnidad AS FinalUnidad ,a.AnteriorKG+a.EntradaKG-SalidasKG+DevolucionesKG AS FinalKG ,a.AnteriorMTSLIN+a.EntradaMTSLIN-SalidasMTSLIN+DevolucionesMTSLIN AS FinalMTSLIN ,a.AnteriorMTS2+a.EntradaMTS2-SalidasMTS2+DevolucionesMTS2 AS FinalMTS2 FROM (SELECT EN01ARTI.CodArticulo, EN01ARTI.Descripcion, LEFT(EN01ARTI.CodArticulo,10) AS Cod4, LEFT(EN01ARTI.CodArticulo,3) AS Cod3, LEFT(EN01ARTI.CodArticulo,2) AS Cod2, LEFT(EN01ARTI.CodArticulo,1) AS Cod1, Sum(IIf(EN01ARTI.MedidaUnidad=DT02ARTI.Medida,DT02ARTI.Anterior,0)) AS AnteriorUnidad, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'KG',DT02ARTI.Anterior,0)) AS AnteriorKG, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'MTS-LIN',DT02ARTI.Anterior,0)) AS AnteriorMTSLIN, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'MTS2',DT02ARTI.Anterior,0)) AS AnteriorMTS2, Sum(IIf(EN01ARTI.MedidaUnidad=DT02ARTI.Medida ,DT02ARTI.Entradas,0)) AS EntradaUnidad, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'KG',DT02ARTI.Entradas,0)) AS EntradaKG, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'MTS-LIN',DT02ARTI.Entradas,0)) AS EntradaMTSLIN, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'MTS2',DT02ARTI.Entradas,0)) AS EntradaMTS2, Sum(IIf(EN01ARTI.MedidaUnidad=DT02ARTI.Medida,DT02ARTI.Salidas,0)) AS SalidasUnidad, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'KG',DT02ARTI.Salidas,0)) AS SalidasKG, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'MTS-LIN',DT02ARTI.Salidas,0)) AS SalidasMTSLIN, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'MTS2',DT02ARTI.Salidas,0)) AS SalidasMTS2, Sum(IIf(EN01ARTI.MedidaUnidad=DT02ARTI.Medida,DT02ARTI.DevolucionesVentas,0)) AS DevolucionesUnidad, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'KG',DT02ARTI.DevolucionesVentas,0)) AS DevolucionesKG, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'MTS-LIN',DT02ARTI.DevolucionesVentas,0)) AS DevolucionesMTSLIN, Sum(IIf(DT02ARTI.Medida = 'MTS2', DT02ARTI.DevolucionesVentas, 0)) As DevolucionesMTS2 FROM DT02ARTI, DT01ARTI, EN01ARTI, MT01DEFI WHERE (DT02ARTI.CodArticulo = EN01ARTI.CodArticulo) AND (DT01ARTI.CodArticulo = EN01ARTI.CodArticulo) AND (DT01ARTI.CodAlmacen = DT02ARTI.CodAlmacen) AND (Len(EN01ARTI.CodArticulo)> MT01DEFI.LongitudMaximaParaFamilia) [AND (DT02ARTI.Periodo = {periodo}) ] [AND (EN01ARTI.CodArticulo BETWEEN {articulodesde} AND {articulohasta}) ] [AND DT01ARTI.CodAlmacen = {almacen}] GROUP BY EN01ARTI.CodArticulo,EN01ARTI.Descripcion, LEFT(EN01ARTI.CodArticulo,1),LEFT(EN01ARTI.CodArticulo,2),LEFT(EN01ARTI.CodArticulo,3),LEFT(EN01ARTI.CodArticulo,10)) a WHERE (a.AnteriorUnidad<>0) OR (a.AnteriorKG<>0) OR (a.AnteriorMTSLIN<>0) OR (a.AnteriorMTS2<>0) OR (a.EntradaUnidad<>0) OR (a.EntradaKG<>0) OR (a.EntradaMTSLIN<>0) OR (a.EntradaMTS2<>0) OR (a.SalidasUnidad<>0) OR (a.SalidasKG<>0) OR (a.SalidasMTSLIN<>0) OR (a.SalidasMTS2<>0) OR (a.DevolucionesUnidad<>0) OR (a.DevolucionesKG<>0) OR (a.DevolucionesMTSLIN<>0) OR (a.DevolucionesMTS2<>0)

QueryColumn.Name: Desc1
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT Descripcion FROM EN01ARTI WHERE CodArticulo=a.cod1) AS

QueryColumn.Name: Desc2
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT Descripcion FROM EN01ARTI WHERE CodArticulo=a.cod2) AS

QueryColumn.Name: Desc3
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT Descripcion FROM EN01ARTI WHERE CodArticulo=a.cod3) AS

QueryColumn.Name: Desc4
QueryColumn.ColumnName: (SELECT Descripcion FROM EN01ARTI WHERE CodArticulo=a.cod4) AS

Query.SQLRaw: SELECT CodArticulo,concat(CodArticulo,' / ',Descripcion) as descripcion2 FROM en01arti order by CodArticulo
SELECT CodArticulo,concat(CodArticulo,' / ',Descripcion) as descripcion2 FROM en01arti order by CodArticulo
SELECT CodAlmacen,concat(CodAlmacen,' / ',DesAlmacen) as descripcion2 FROM mt01alma order by CodAlmacen

CriteriaItem.Name: periodo
CriteriaItem.Title: Periodo
CriteriaItem.CriteriaDefaults: <SqlValor>SELECT Periodo as Valor FROM mt01peco WHERE (SELECT CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) between Fecha_Desde and Fecha_Hasta</SqlValor>

Query.SQLRaw: SELECT Periodo ,Descripcion,CONCAT(Periodo,' .') as Desc2 FROM Mt01peco
